attributes.action: Make VW pay similar compensation to UK customers as the USA.
attributes.background: We have two cars that have been impacted by this emissions scandal and are appalled at what appears to be the lack of progress by VW unless you live in the United States. Let’s get the UK government to ensure that VW offer a similar package to all UK customers.

rejection.details: This is a commercial decision for Volkswagen, unless you have a contractual claim against the company.
